text:
e="preserve">Malcolm Dixon (September 1953 – 9 April 2020) was an English actor. He was best known as Strutter in the 1981 movie "Time Bandits". His height was 4'1" and because of it he often played Ewoks and dwarfs. Dixon worked in Jim Henson's Creature Shop. He also played an Oompa Loompa in "Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory" (1971). Dixon was born in Crook, County Durham.
Dixon died on 9 April 2020 at the age of 66.
